author: DigitalElph
content: Andreas - Great photography as always. I have been impressed with your work for some time. Being a Canon "shooter" the price you mentioned for the 5D MKII caught my eye and I can only say that the current price for a 5D MKII body in the US is $2700 or 1800 Euros. Check www.BHphoto.com and they do ship internationally. Even when adding customs duties it should be worth it.
